level.text: The Board shall publish each advisory opinion in the D.C. Register within thirty (30) calendar days of the issuance of the opinion.
The published advisory opinion shall not disclose the identity of the requestor unless the disclosure has been previously consented to in writing by the requestor.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 28 D.C. Reg. 2153, 2155 (May 15, 1981).
